name: NEW!!! Snow Queen 'Frozen Ghost' necklace
description:
Devilishly dashing, hauntingly handsome, this beauty is happiest hanging round your neck. The styleleader of the afterlife.

STYLING TIP: Looks particularly all powerful next to icy neutrals. 

-------------
And check out our gorgeous new packaging!!
-------------

DETAILS:

44cm silver plated chain (53 and 80cm chain also available on request), silver plate charm with white enamel detail, 1cm rose gold plate skull

name: 'Don't lose your head' bracelet, Bitten lip lavender with rose gold skulls
description:
'Don't lose your head' 
Bitten lip Lavender

Keep your cool with the ‘Don’t lose your head’ bracelet. Wear it alone to make a subtle statement, or pile them high for a rock n’ roll wrist Keith Richards would be proud of!

 Why not try mixing our new rose gold beauty with other pastels for a kooky look?


Details

Waxed handwoven cord bracelet with three antiqued yellow gold plated bronze skulls, studs and crystal fixer.


size 
Regular - 18cm circumference

Due to the handmade nature of these bracelets, each one will be slightly unique. Please allow 3 - 10 working days for delivery.

name: 'Dead Romantics' bracelet, Veiled envy green
description:
'Dead Romantics'
Veiled envy green

Sultry and sophisticated, dark and deadly, this is a fiend of a friendship bracelet.  Slip it in among a wrist full of pretty trinkets to keep things interesting.
 

Details

 Adjustable waxed handwoven cord bracelet with one antiqued yellow gold plated brass skull, 4 fastenings, 3 trinkets.


Size adjustable 

Due to the handmade nature of these bracelets, each one will be slightly unique. Please allow 3 - 10 working days for delivery.

name: Bond Girl Red 'Count Your Confessions' bracelet
description:
01 'Count your Confessions' bracelet
Bond girl Red

Even the best girls are bad sometimes - cover your back with the 'Count Your Confessions' bracelet. Simply shake it like a polaroid picture and watch it fall into line. The good Lord above is sure to forgive and forget... And it is very good at keeping the vampires at bay too.


Details

Nylon cord bracelet with silver plate pewter crosses, metallic beads and gold metal trinkets.

size 
Adjustable

Due to the handmade nature of these bracelets, each one will be slightly unique. Please allow up to 10 working days for delivery.
